function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of new strains of influenza virus leading to pandemics","Impact":"High mortality rate among certain age groups, large number of hospitalizations and deaths","Mitigation":"Timely vaccination, implementation of public health measures, surveillance and monitoring","Technologies":"Vaccine development, surveillance systems, public health infrastructure","People":"People of all ages, especially those with limited access to healthcare","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies, policy makers"},{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19 with distinct stages of transmission","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare systems, high mortality rates, economic and social disruptions","Mitigation":"Enforcement of travel bans, lockdowns, and public health measures, international collaboration and information sharing","Technologies":"Digital surveillance, travel restrictions, testing and contact tracing","People":"Global population, especially those in densely populated areas with limited healthcare access","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, international organizations"}]}
